entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued August 09 at 4:23PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT FOR ELEVATED FINE PARTICULATE MATTER LEVELS DUE TO WILDFIRE SMOKE FROM THE BUNNIE FIRE IN RAMONA... The San Diego APCD has issued an air quality alert due to increased fine particulate matter and smoke from the Bunnie Wildfire in Ramona. The air quality alert is in effect through 8 am Thursday for the cities of Ramona and Santa Ysabel and surrounding areas.
